protectentirewiki-desc: This extension allows system operators to protect the entire wiki or entire namespace.
protectentirewiki-edit-disallowed-msgbox: You have been disallowed from editing this page!
protectentirewiki-edit-disallowed-text-b: , the wiki you are editing or the namespace of the page you are editing (
protectentirewiki-edit-disallowed-text-a: ) has been protected by system operators, ask them for more information.
